alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:13PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Moffat County through 145 PM MDT... At 113 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Craig, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Craig around 125 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 85 and 98. Colorado 13 between mile markers 80 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains
